languages.text: "Конечно, династия Чорда все равно нуждается в людях, подобных мне — образованных, умеющих думать. Но всякий допущенный к книгам оказывается под строгим надзором. Я слышал, на корабле Леди Инцендии есть отсек для мудрецов и хранителей знаний, похожий больше на тюрьму, чем на либрариум".

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, династия Чорда все равно нуждается в людях, подобных мне — образованных, умеющих думать. Но всякий допущенный к книгам оказывается под строгим надзором. Я слышал, на корабле Леди Инцендии есть отсек для мудрецов и хранителей знаний, похожий больше на тюрьму, чем на либрариум".

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge, which more resembles a prison than a librarium."

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge, which more resembles a prison than a librarium."

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

"Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

languages.text: «Naturalmente, la casa Chorda sigue necesitando personas como yo, dotadas de formación académica y pensamiento intelectual. Pero quienes reciben dispensas para el aprendizaje han de estudiar bajo una estricta supervisión. Tengo entendido que en la nave de lady Incendia hay un compartimento entero para sabios y guardianes del conocimiento que se asemeja más a una prisión que a un bibliotecarium».
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, la casa Chorda sigue necesitando personas como yo, dotadas de formación académica y pensamiento intelectual. Pero quienes reciben dispensas para el aprendizaje han de estudiar bajo una estricta supervisión. Tengo entendido que en la nave de lady Incendia hay un compartimento entero para sabios y guardianes del conocimiento que se asemeja más a una prisión que a una biblioteca».

languages.text: 「当然ながら、チョーダ家は私のような、教養があり、知的な思考ができる人間を必要としている。しかし、学ぶことを許された者は、厳しい監視のもとで学ぶことになる。インセンディア様の船には、賢者や知識の保持者専用の区画があると聞いていますが、それは図書館というよりは牢獄に似ています」
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

traits.locale_text: 「当然ながら、チョーダ家は私のような、教養があり、知的な思考ができる人間を必要としている。しかし、学ぶことを許された者は、厳しい監視のもとで学ぶことになる。インセンディア様の船には、賢者や知識の保持者専用の区画があると聞いていますが、それは図書館というよりは牢獄に似ています」

languages.text: “当然，库尔达家族依然需要像我这样受过教育、有能力思考的人。然而，所有被允许学习的人们，都要在严格的监督下进行学习。我听说因森蒂娅女士的船上有个豪华的房间，专门为贤者与知识的守护者所设立，但在我看来，那里与其说是图书馆，还不是说是监狱。”
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

traits.locale_text: “当然，库尔达家族依然需要像我这样受过教育、有能力思考的人。然而，所有被允许学习的人们，都要在严格的监督下进行学习。我听说因森蒂娅女士的船上有个豪华的房间，专门为贤者与知识的守护者所设立，但在我看来，那里与其说是图书馆，还不是说是监狱。”

languages.text: "Es liegt in der Natur der Dinge, dass Haus Chorda Verwendung für Leute wie mich hat ... gebildet und zu intellektuellem Denken fähig. Allerdings werden alle, denen es erlaubt ist, zu lernen, streng überwacht. Ich hörte, dass Lady Incendias Schiff über eine Abteilung für Weise und Wissenshüter verfügt, die eher einem Gefängnis gleicht, als einem Librarium."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

traits.locale_text: "Es liegt in der Natur der Dinge, dass Haus Chorda Verwendung für Leute wie mich hat ... gebildet und zu intellektuellem Denken fähig. Allerdings werden alle, denen es erlaubt ist, zu lernen, streng überwacht. Ich hörte, dass Lady Incendias Schiff über eine Abteilung für Weise und Wissenshüter verfügt, die eher einem Gefängnis gleicht, als einem Librarium."

languages.text: « Naturellement, la maison Chorda a tout de même besoin d'hommes comme moi, de gens instruits qui soient capables de réfléchir. Cependant, quiconque obtient l'autorisation d'étudier le fait sous étroite supervision. J'ai même entendu dire que le compartiment dédié aux sages et aux gardiens du savoir aménagé à bord du vaisseau de dame Incendia ressemblait davantage à une prison qu'à un librarium. »
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."

traits.locale_text: « Naturellement, la maison Chorda a tout de même besoin d'hommes comme moi, de gens instruits qui soient capables de réfléchir. Cependant, quiconque obtient l'autorisation d'étudier le fait sous étroite supervision. J'ai même entendu dire que le compartiment dédié aux sages et aux gardiens du savoir aménagé à bord du vaisseau de dame Incendia ressemblait davantage à une prison qu'à un librarium. »

languages.text: "Chorda Hanesi'nin doğal olarak hâlâ benim gibi eğitimli ve entelektüel düşünceye muktedir insanlara ihtiyacı var. Ancak öğrenim görmesine izin verilen herkes, bunu katı bir gözetim altında yapıyor. Duyduğum kadarıyla Leydi İncendia'nın gemisinde âlimler ve irfanın koruyucuları için özel bir kompartıman bulunuyormuş ve bir libraryumdan çok hapishaneyi andırıyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, House Chorda still has need of people like me — educated and capable of intellectual thought. However, anyone who is permitted to learn does so under strict supervision. I have heard Lady Incendia's ship has a dedicated compartment for sages and keepers of knowledge that more resembles a prison than a librarium."
